root.data: Add commentMore actions W Add an approved person

data.name: ReExManageAccountPersonUserFromTeam.Intro.Paragraph1
data.value: W You should invite an ‘approved person’ who needs to be invited to take on tasks on behalf of the organisation.

data.name: ReExManageAccountPersonUserFromTeam.Intro.Paragraph2
data.value: W You can continue to add the organisation without inviting someone to be an approved person. One must be appointed before you can:

data.name: ReExManageAccountPersonUserFromTeam.Bullet.Apply
data.value: W apply for accreditation

data.name: ReExManageAccountPersonUserFromTeam.Bullet.DataReturns
data.value: W submit and verify data returns

data.name: ReExManageAccountPersonUserFromTeam.Inset
data.value: W An approved person may delegate their function to another person (a delegate) at a later stage – subject to regulator approval.

data.name: ReExManageAccountPersonUserFromTeam.Note.MultiplePersons
data.value: W More than one person can be nominated – you will need to confirm their role, enter their name and contact details.

data.name: ReExManageAccountPersonUserFromTeam.Roles.Heading
data.value: W Roles eligible to be an approved person

data.name: ReExManageAccountPersonUserFromTeam.Roles.Description
data.value: W A person who controls or manages an unincorporated association or organisation without a registered address, head office or principal place of business in the United Kingdom. For example:

data.name: ReExManageAccountPersonUserFromTeam.Roles.Example.CEO
data.value: W Chief Executive Officer

data.name: ReExManageAccountPersonUserFromTeam.Roles.Example.Director
data.value: W Director

data.name: ReExManageAccountPersonUserFromTeam.Roles.Example.Owner
data.value: W Owner

data.name: ReExManageAccountPersonUserFromTeam.Roles.Example.Partner
data.value: W Partner

data.name: ReExManageAccountPersonUserFromTeam.Roles.Example.CompanyDirector
data.value: W Company Director or Secretary

data.name: ReExManageAccountPersonUserFromTeam.Roles.Example.Charity
data.value: W Chair, Treasurer, or Secretary of an unincorporated association

data.name: ReExManageAccountPersonUserFromTeam.Invite.Heading
data.value: W Invite users in your team

data.name: ReExManageAccountPersonUserFromTeam.Invite.Instruction
data.value: W Select an option to proceed.

data.name: ReExManageAccountPersonUserFromTeam.Option.TeamMember
data.value: W I will invite an eligible person to be an approved person

data.name: ReExManageAccountPersonUserFromTeam.Option.Later
data.value: W I will invite an approved person later

data.name: ReExManageAccountPersonUserFromTeam.Button.Confirm
data.value: W Confirm

data.name: ReExManageAccountPersonUserFromTeam.ErrorMessage.Required
data.value: W Select whether to invite the individual in charge of the business to be an approved person or do this later
